page_content:
Rackspace Ltd

Managed Virtualisation – Managed

Rackspace Managed Virtualisation – Managed is a private cloud underpinned by our Managed service level, aimed at customers who need scalability but also guaranteed resiliency and security of a dedicated cloud platform. Based on industry-leading VMware vSphere technology, backed by seamless Fanatical Support for highest levels of service and availability

Features

  • Nominated Service Delivery Manager and Business Development Consultant
  • Reactive monitoring toolset
  • Pay per use billing
  • 1 hour hardware replacement and 100% network infrastructure SLA
  • Fully customisable hypervisors; clone existing VMs in 24 hours
  • Trusted advice and service management focus
  • Optional Hybrid Cloud capability to burst into Public Cloud
  • Leader in Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for Managed Hosting

Benefits

  • 24x7x365 Fanatical Support
  • Quick resolution of incidents through reactive monitoring solutions
  • Control panel to easily manage account and tickets
  • Greater uptime by fast resolution of hardware faults
  • Protect business critical applications through automated replication tools
  • Reduce operational burden, as Rackspace manages the OS layer
  • Benefit from Rackspace's extensive experience managing VMware at scale

Pricing

£4.06 per unit per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Month
